profile.description:
My name is Jesus Alfredo, I'm interested in programming, I've been in intensive preparation for a year, where I've acquired solid skills in web development.
Despite not having formal work experience, I've developed several personal projects that demonstrate my ability to apply the knowledge acquired. I want to apply my skills in a professional environment and contribute to the growth of your team.

experience.title: Certifications
experience.third-job-title: Front-end and back-end programming and development

hobbies.act-description: One of my greatest pleasures is to get on my motorcycle and get lost on unknown roads. The feeling of freedom and adventure that each trip gives me is unmatched.
